creator: Georg.Stengl@web2cad.de
text:
Hi, 

when I call the "org.apache.fop.apps.Fop -xml web2cad.xml.sav -xsl 
web2cad_print.xsl -pdf w2c.pdf"
and my xml-File is about 87 KB, it works.
If I'm using a big one with 5,7 MB than during the building formatting object 
tree the error java.lang.OutOfMemoryError raises.
Do you have any solution?

wbr 
Georg

Created attachment 137
the xml which fails
creator: Georg.Stengl@web2cad.de

the xml which fails
creator: Georg.Stengl@web2cad.de
j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text:
Starting with 0.20.1, attempts has been made to reduce memory consumtion
significantly. However, extensive memory consuption can't always be avoided
(forward references).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 1063 ***

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
